mapper.insert: insert into course (id, name, content, score, teacher_id, num, time, location, college_id, already_num) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{content}, #{score}, #{teacherId}, #{num}, #{time}, #{location}, #{collegeId}, #{alreadyNum})
mapper.update: update course set name = #{name}, content = #{content}, score = #{score}, teacher_id = #{teacherId}, num = #{num}, time = #{time}, location = #{location}, college_id = #{collegeId}, already_num = #{alreadyNum} where id = #{id}
